doc.field: Print Matter. Report of the Merchants' Committee for the Relief of Colored People Suffering from the Riots in the City of New York
Print Matter. Report of the Merchants' Committee for the Relief of Colored People Suffering from the Riots in the City of New York
Contains pamphlet (1863) and bookseller's invoice to Haynes (1957). Other copies of the pamphlet are also available at N-YHS; refer to call numbers microform Film 90-62 or F128.44.C72 1863.
